content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll create a comprehensive report of the existing structures and error tips.

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=0.0, y=0.0 and x=2.0, y=0.0)
Two stone furnaces working in parallel to produce iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel system and iron ore input
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel system and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace setup:
- Furnace at (4,4) with coal fuel system for copper plate production

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Automated assembly system consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5,11.5) storing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5,11.5) crafting iron gear wheels
- Output burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) storing iron gear wheels

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-24.5)
Steam-based power plant:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Facility
- Lab researching Logistics technology
- Connected to the power grid
- Currently processing automation science packs

# ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Always check inventory before attempting to insert resources into machines
- Keep track of iron ore and coal levels as these were depleted during operation

### Assembly Line Resource Management
- Monitor assembler input inventory to prevent ingredient shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of iron plates to maintain continuous gear wheel production

### Power System Management
- Maintain adequate coal supply in boiler to prevent power interruptions
- Current coal levels in boiler are relatively low (7 units)

### Production Line Efficiency
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to prevent idle time
- Copper furnace was observed with no ingredients to smelt at times
